about_the_game:
This game is a first-person shooter. You will be tasked with eliminating a monster named Manyfang.

However, the location you are heading to is a scary place with a suffocating atmosphere, creating a sense of pressure.

On the map, there will be guiding hands pointing the direction the player needs to go.

When the player eliminates zombies, they will receive Souls. The player can exchange the Souls for ammunition or healing items.

This game may contain content that is not suitable for all ages or may not be appropriate for viewing in a workplace: frequent violence or bloodshed, general adult content.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game may contain content that is not suitable for all ages or may not be appropriate for viewing in a workplace: frequent violence or bloodshed, general adult content.
The game is about eliminating monsters and zombies. Players use guns as weapons. When players shoot monsters and zombies, they bleed. When zombies die, they turn into corpses. Monsters explode upon death, but there are no body parts—only smoke.
This game does not contain sexual harassment, non-consensual sex, BDSM, drug or alcohol use, or self-harm.

detailed_description:
This game is a first-person shooter. You will be tasked with eliminating a monster named Manyfang.

However, the location you are heading to is a scary place with a suffocating atmosphere, creating a sense of pressure.

On the map, there will be guiding hands pointing the direction the player needs to go.

When the player eliminates zombies, they will receive Souls. The player can exchange the Souls for ammunition or healing items.

This game may contain content that is not suitable for all ages or may not be appropriate for viewing in a workplace: frequent violence or bloodshed, general adult content.
name: Shoot P

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10,11
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-12100F
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD RX 6600 / Nvidia RTX 3060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
